Text:
Save me writing eveytime I upload another movie, just go here and check what uploads I have and see if there are any new uploads.. 


http://thepiratebay.org/user/arnold1965

@martin_bonan
Use Nero (or similar) as you can't use Alcohol to author a DVD.
In Nero, create a 'DVD Video' then burn all files (apart from the sample) to the 'VIDEO_TS' folder on that new DVD.
Google 'DVD author tutorial' for more info.
